sample_applications.notes: Phone screen with hiring manager Sarah Chen
Good technical skills but not a culture fit

sample_emails.subject: Interview Invitation - Software Engineer Position
sample_emails.body: Hi there! We'd like to schedule a phone screen for the Software Engineer position you applied for. Are you available next week? Best regards, Sarah Chen, Technical Recruiter

classification.reasoning: Contains interview scheduling language and recruiter contact

sample_emails.subject: Application Received - Product Manager Role
sample_emails.body: Thank you for your application to the Product Manager position at Microsoft. We have received your application and will review it shortly.

sample_emails.subject: Congratulations! Job Offer - DevOps Engineer
sample_emails.body: Congratulations! We're pleased to extend an offer for the DevOps Engineer position. Please review the attached offer letter and let us know if you have any questions.

classification.reasoning: Clear job offer language with congratulations
